## Mutator.findParentWs() method

Get the parent workspace of a workspace that is inside a mutator, taking into account whether it is a flyout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static findParentWs(workspace: WorkspaceSvg): WorkspaceSvg | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace that is inside a mutator. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) \| null

The mutator's parent workspace or null.
